data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Massachusetts, United States a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Massachusetts, United States
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Massachusetts, United States, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Massachusetts with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Massachusetts, United States that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Massachusetts
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,820,681 believers in Massachusetts to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 5,074,219 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 3,453,290 people in the state of Massachusetts who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

location.name: Massachusetts
location.cities_list: Boston, South Boston, Worcester, Springfield, Lowell
location.cities_list_w_pop: Boston (675,647), South Boston (571,281), Worcester (206,518), Springfield (154,341), Lowell (110,699)
